metadata.title: CVE-2024-40939 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: wwan: iosm: Fix tainted pointer delete is case of region creation failIn case of region creation fail in ipc_devlink_create_region(), previouslycreated regions delete process starts from tainted pointer which actuallyholds error code value.Fix this bug by decreasing region index before delete.Found by Linux Verification Center (linuxtesting.org) with SVACE.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-kvm package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
